title: Net income of Marriott International worldwide 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Net income in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
Overall Net income in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The line drastically increased by 2.9 times from Year 2011 to 2012, and lastly, increased by 1.8 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Net income in million U.S. dollars, about 1907.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Net income in million U.S. dollars, of value 198.0 was reported at Year 2011
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Net income in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 13.
In general Net income in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.

Net income in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2011, gradually increasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly decreasing from 2017 to 2019.
